So straight away the market is out of balance, it's unsure, there's a lot of, you know,

accept that prices are a lot lower on the previous day, and now suddenly we're trading

and that creates the potential for opportunity. Now what I will say as a rule of thumb, when a

necessarily volume, but volatility. So we tend to get a lot of more sort of what is seemingly
